list.abs: although they recused themselves from direct participation , they are understood to support the bulk of the findings .虽然他们否认自己的直接参与，但他们都支持这项报告的大部分内容。
cuomo recused himself in money manager case linked to scandal., 奥莫回避自己的资金经理案例联系丑闻.
法律英语词汇R-1|... ... 再次盘问再次盘问 recross 法官回避 recusal by a judge 法官之回避 Recusal of Judges.
forty-seven states have adopted the american bar association' s tougher rule for recusal when " impartiality might reasonably be questioned " .有四十七个州接受了美国律师公会更为严格的回避规则即“对公正存在合理怀疑”。
